function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling enveloped viruses without proper chloroform treatment","Impact":"Risk of not completely inactivating the enveloped viruses, leading to potential exposure and spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Ensure proper inactivation methods are followed according to safety guidelines for handling enveloped viruses","Technologies":"Use of chloroform treatment and other approved inactivation methods for enveloped viruses","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and anyone involved in the sample processing","Owner":"Laboratory safety officer, biosafety committee, and research supervisors"},{"Description":"Prolonged lysis phase during RNA extraction","Impact":"Risk of potential RNA contamination or degradation, leading to inaccurate test results","Mitigation":"Adhere to standard lysis phase duration as recommended by the manufacturer's instructions for RNA extraction","Technologies":"Use of validated RNA extraction protocols and equipment","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and anyone involved in RNA extraction","Owner":"Laboratory safety officer, biosafety committee, and research supervisors"},{"Description":"Use of nested RT-PCR assays without standardization for SARS-CoV-2 detection","Impact":"Risk of unreliable or inaccurate test results for SARS-CoV-2 detection in environmental samples","Mitigation":"Implement standardized and validated methods for SARS-CoV-2 detection in environmental samples, such as those recommended by public health authorities","Technologies":"Use of validated SARS-CoV-2 detection assays and protocols","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and anyone involved in the testing process","Owner":"Laboratory safety officer, biosafety committee, and research supervisors"}]}
